item.title: Advanced docker build technique
item.description: Usage of Dockerignore Basically, docker build loads all sub directories which cause heavy overhead. If there are lots of sub directories, build needs a lot of time to load all data. We need to ignore unnecessary directories to reduce loading time. .dockerignore prevents to load some files and directories. Basically, we can describe original names of files or directories, but it supports some advanced description technique.
